register_saving_for: First tell Piggy what you are saving for...

price_start_zero_validation: The price can't starts with zero!
price_must_be_number_validation: The price must be a number!
piggy_offer_some_plans: Let Piggy offer you some plans to get the
you_have_to_feed: You should feed Piggy to make Piggy happy.
how_much_i_earned: How much money i have saved so far?
piggy_happy: Piggy is so happy to have you!
please_register: It's seems like, that Piggy didn't find an account for this phone number. Please registrer first, or check your entered phone number
check_internet: Please check your internet connection, then restart the application
verification_failed: Phone number verification failed. Please try again!
go_back_phone_number_tooltip: Go back to type in another phone number
long_code_error: The validation code is too long
short_code_error: The validation code is too short
demo_over_dialog_content: Piggy reached the end of his teenager age! Stay with us, and save more money, when the live version get released!
if_you_dont_have: If you don't have any Piggy coin yet, you can create a money box, where you can put your coins.
you_can_create: You can create as many boxes as you want, bu you can only have 5 active at a time.
selector_explanation: Choose which money boy you want to put money onto!
